title: Sequence string set
description: Sequences for DNA, RNA or protein molecules, plus some extra annotations. This corresponds to a `XStringSet` object from the [**Biostrings**](https://bioconductor.org/packages/Biostrings) Bioconductor package. If the sequences are associated with quality scores, this corresponds instead to a `QualityScaledXStringSet` object.

sequence_file.description: Biological sequences in FASTA or FASTQ format. The nature of the sequence is described in the sequence file's own metadata.

sequence_data.description: A data frame containing additional annotations for each sequence. Each row corresponds to a sequence in the FASTA/FASTQ file. Omitted if no annotations are present.

other_data.description: A list containing additional annotations for the object. Omitted if no annotations are present.

names.description: Whether the sequences were named. If `false`, placeholder names are created in the sequence file at `sequence_file`; these should be ignored for further processing.
